block_comment: This block of code is a piece of a debug feature in Verilog environment, primarily used for displaying initial boot memory information. It utilizes the built-in $display function to print out the specified string along with the value of the macro `BOOT_MEM128_PARAMS_FILE. The $display function is triggered initially with the simulation start. The string represents a formatted message indicating the boot memory file being used. The purpose of this block is to provide debug log for integrating system or program tests.
